content: प्रतिहत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Struck or beaten back; knocked back. {@--2@} Driven away, repelled, repulsed; <ls>Ś. 7. 32.</ls> {@--3@} Opposed, obstructed. {@--4@} Sent, despatched, {@--5@} Hated, disliked. {@--6@} Disappointed, frustrated. {@--7@} Fallen, overthrown. {@--8@} Tied, bound.
